name: Variation Swatches Smart Products Gallery for WooCommerce
author: CodeSolz

sections.description:
Introducing the ultimate sales booster for your WooCommerce store ‚Äì a smart popup product recommendations gallery of variation swatches that automatically converts your online store into a virtual physical store. This dedicated WooCommerce plugin helps you to increase your sales by displaying all products with the same color variation in different varieties to potential customers with just a single click.

Imagine being able to show all similar products to your customers with just one click! That’s precisely what this plugin does. With the help of popular variation swatches, it transforms your online store to look just like a physical store. This advanced add-on works seamlessly with all the popular WooCommerce variation swatches plugins to give your customers a shopping experience that’s as close to real-life as possible.

When a user views a product, they can simply click on any color swatch created by the variation swatches plugin to view different varieties of that product. This intuitive feature saves time for your customers and boosts sales for your store. With this plugin, you can provide a personalized shopping experience that will delight your customers and drive up your revenue.

Get ready to take your WooCommerce store to the next level with this plugin! Say goodbye to complicated settings and hello to hassle-free installation ‚Äì just download and install, and the plugin will take care of the rest.

Supported Plugins

Variation Swatches Adjacent Products for WooCommerce is an extension of popular variation swatches plugins. If you’ve already installed any of these plugins, you’re all set to use this powerful feature!

  • Variation Swatches for WooCommerce – Emran Ahmed
  • Variation Swatches for WooCommerce – Woosuite
  • Product Variations Swatches for WooCommerce – VillaTheme
  • Variation Swatches for WooCommerce – RadiusTheme
  • Smart Variation Swatches for WooCommerce – aThemeArt
  • Variation Swatches for WooCommerce – ThemeHigh
  • XT WooCommerce Variation Swatches – XplodedThemes

How Does It Work?

Imagine if your store could provide the same instant experience as a physical store, where the shopkeeper could show you exactly what you’re looking for in an instant.

Now, with Variation Swatches Smart Products Gallery for WooCommerce, you can create that same seamless experience for your customers. This powerful plugin lets you display all available variations of a product with different designs, right on the same page, eliminating the need for customers to navigate through multiple pages or websites.

Not only does this feature provide ultimate convenience for your customers, but it’s also a powerful sales booster for your store. Customers will love being able to quickly and easily find the perfect color and design, leading to increased customer satisfaction and ultimately higher sales.

With easy installation and no complicated settings required, this plugin is the perfect solution for any WooCommerce store looking to elevate the customer experience.

N.B: that this feature currently only works on single product pages.

‚û°Ô∏è Basic Documentation To Get Started

üëâ HOW TO INSTALL, SETUP – A complete installation video guide
* How to setup the plugin
* Live Demo & Documentation

  • Video guideline to get started

Forum and Feature Request

For Quick Support, feature request and bug reporting

  • Visit our website to Get Instant Support for Variation Swatches
  • For more dedicated support or feature request write to us at support@codesolz.net or create a ticket Support Center

As it’s open source, check our github development Status

  • Check development status or issues in github.com/WooCommerce-AltCoin-Payment-Gateway
sections.installation:
1. Upload the woo-variation-swatches-adjacent-products folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
Version: 1.0.9 ( January 09, 2023 )

  • Improvement: WordPress 6.4 & WooCommerce >= 8.4 compatible

Version: 1.0.8 ( September 09, 2023 )

  • Improvement: WordPress 6.3 & WooCommerce >= 8.0 compatible

Version: 1.0.7 ( April 06, 2023 )

  • Improvement: WordPress 6.2 & WooCommerce > 7.5 compatible

Version: 1.0.5 ( January 24, 2023 )

  • Improvement: WooCommerce latest version compatible

Version: 1.0.4 ( September 19, 2022 )

  • Improvement: JavaScript code has been modernized

Version: 1.0.3

  • Improvement: WordPress 6.0 & PHP 8 compatible

Version: 1.0.2

  • Improvement: WordPress 5.8 compatible

Version: 1.0.1

  • Improvement: 6+ plugins support

Version: 1.0.0

  • Initial release.
